name: Bright Dark
description:
Bright Dark - Trijam #102

Is little abstract twisted take on endless runners. Goal is to avoid runnig into pits in otherwise perfecly black and white lines. You can also occasionally take some P durring your run which will clear your path from pits. This is just simple gameplay description, the true meaning can be discoverd through playing game itself. Enjoy.

Controls:

A - left

D - right

It's nice and simple.

All audio is from YT sound library, other assets were made durring jam. Game itselft with all polishing took bit more hours than just 3, but I think that result is worth it.
